recommended_degree: Teknik Industri, Teknik Telekomunikasi, Sistem Informasi, Manajemen dan Administrasi Logistik, Matematika (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Prepare MR draft based on request from project team 
2. Request PCE, DCE to publish configuration 
3. Monitoring DN release until MOS at site
4. Monitoring site sign and site verify
5. Responsible for KPI OTD1, Site sign, Site verify, MOS On Time and MOS Accuracy
6. Support project delivery implementation by ensure and enhance success supply of installation equipment needed.
7. Close coordination with other internal supply chain team and understand the scope of warehousing, local deliver, reverse logistics, HTM, POD
